name: Kritika
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: No matter where life takes us, I promise to stand beside you, support you, and love you more with every passing day.
text2: On this beautiful day, I thank God for bringing you into my life.
text3: You are my greatest blessing and the reason my world feels so complete.
text4: I pray that happiness always follows you, that every tear is replaced with a smile, and that every dream you hold close to your heart comes true.
text5Entry: May God bless you with good health, peace of mind, and endless success.
text5Content: May your life be filled with love as pure as your heart and moments as beautiful as your smile.
wishHeading: Happy Birthday my beautiful girl — may love, luck, and divine blessings always protect you
